document.full_text: a powerful tornado scored a direct hit on the southwest missouri town of joplin, killing at least 89 people with many more missing and injured, authorities said on monday.
document.title: factbox: deadliest single tornadoes in u.s. history
lines_and_colors: a powerful tornado scored a direct hit on the southwest missouri town of joplin, killing at least 89 people with many more missing and injured, authorities said on monday.
